Class.name: CacheGitHubCI.Task
Class.Description: Simple update task. Use CacheGitHubCI.Hook if you need more functionality.

Property.name: Username
Property.Description:
GitHub user, who has access to repository. Optional for public repositories.
Note, that with Username/Password, you can make up to 5,000 requests per hour. For unauthenticated requests, the rate limit allows to make up to 60 requests per hour. Unauthenticated requests are associated with an IP address.
Required, if you want to create webhooks

Property.name: Password
Property.Description: GitHub password, corresponding to Username. Optional for public repositories.

Property.name: Namespace
Property.Description: Namespace, where to download and compile repository

Method.name: OnTask
